title: Historical Event Schema
description: Schema for documenting significant historical events within The Shadow Team Chronicles universe, such as battles, discoveries, political changes, and other narrative turning points that shape the world and its characters.

object_type.description: Fixed value indicating this is a historical event object. This constrains the general object_type property from the base schema to ensure proper categorization.

event_type.description: Classification of the event's fundamental nature, determining how it impacts the world and narrative. This categorization helps with filtering events and understanding their typical patterns of influence on the world.
